arts.sum: Watch highlights from the Scottish Premiership match between Hearts of Midlothian and Hibernian.

arts.ttl: Supporter arrested after alleged racist abuse of Jordan Obita during SPL’s Edinburgh derby
arts.sum: Dwight Gayle scored a late winner for Hibs at Hearts

arts.ttl: Four wins in five & top six in sight - what's changed at Hibs?
arts.sum: Hibs beat Hearts to make it three wins in a row, so what has head coach David Gray done to improve matters after a wretched start to the season?

arts.ttl: Neil Critchley 'didn't like' Hearts display after Hibs punch in the nose as he eyes January transfer boost
arts.sum: It was another afternoon to forget for the Jambos as the Hibees claimed the derby bragging rights in Gorgie

arts.ttl: David Gray hails Hibs for rewriting Hearts derby narrative as he reveals challenge set to Easter Road stars
arts.sum: The Hibees grabbing the bragging rights in the capital after Dwight Gayle's late winner at Tynecastle

arts.ttl: Gayle scores late to see Hibs past Hearts in the Edinburgh derby
arts.sum: Dwight Gayle came off the bench to score the winning goal at Tynecastle as Hibernian saw off rivals Hearts in a 2-1 victory.

arts.ttl: Hibernian record rare victory at Hearts thanks to Dwight Gayle’s late winner
arts.sum: Gayle’s 78th-minute strike settled the Edinburgh derby.

arts.ttl: Hearts fan arrested for alleged racist abuse during Hibs clash as club take swift action during derby
arts.sum: The shocking moment took place just after the HIbees' goal was confirmed by VAR

arts.ttl: Hearts 0 Hibs 1 LIVE as Josh Campbell heads visitors in front amid more VAR drama
arts.sum: It's a blockbuster in the capital as the rivals go head to head with a big festive three points on offer.

arts.ttl: James Wilson keeping Hearts cool amid Hibs derby heat as teenage hotshot doesn't regret snubbing England
arts.sum: The teenager came off the bench at Easter Road to draw the Jambos level in the first capital clash of the season
